poster-cta-desc: 全球最大的区块链资产交易平台
hg-module6-tab1-content: Trade more than 740 cryptocurrency and fiat pairs, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and BNB with Binance Spot. Experience seamless trading with the largest crypto exchange by trade volume. Our matching system is capable of processing up to 1.4 million orders per second.
hg-module6-tab2-title: Leveraged cryptocurrency trading for everyone on Binance Margin
hg-module6-tab2-content: Borrow funds with ease and amplify your potential earnings on Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, and other favorite cryptocurrencies. Elevate your profits on successful trades on more than XX selected assets. Enjoy up to 125x leverage on selected assets.
hg-module6-tab3-title: Earn interest on your idle crypto assets with Binance Savings
hg-module6-tab3-content: Choose from one of the supported assets, including BNB, USDT, BUSD, and DeFi assets, and start receiving interest on your idle crypto. Choose Flexible Savings for zero lock-up periods on dozens of cryptocurrencies, or Locked Savings for higher returns.
hg-module6-tab4-title: Earn crypto while you sleep with Binance Staking
hg-module6-tab4-content: Generate passive income with Binance Staking by staking your favorite assets. Choose from our wide list of crypto assets, including USDT, BNB, and DAI, or check our DeFi Staking. Push your investment potential to the next level with Binance Staking and DeFi and enjoy our reduced fees.
hg-module6-tab5-title: Increase your mining rewards with Binance Pool
hg-module6-tab5-content: Join the most comprehensive and inclusive service platform dedicated to improving the income of miners. Binance Pool provides you with regular payouts, low fees, and additional products to maximize your mining profits.
hg-module6-tab6-title: Buy the things you love with Binance Card
hg-module6-tab6-content: Experience the future of money and pay with crypto at more than 46 million merchants worldwide. Binance Card gives you up to 7% cashback, instant top-ups, and comes with full support on Google and Samsung Pay. Apply for your Binance Card today.
hg-module6-tab7-title: Borrow crypto in seconds from Binance Crypto Loans
hg-module6-tab7-content: Borrow USDT or BUSD with your crypto assets as collateral. Check our wide range of available assets. Enjoy guaranteed approval and withdraw your borrowed crypto instantly. Convenient, fast, and secure.
hg-module6-tab8-title: Trade USDT-M Futures with up to 125x leverage on Binance Futures
hg-module6-tab8-content: Maximize your potential earnings with Binance USDT-M Futures. Register for your account and start trading USDT-M futures with up to 125x leverage in less than 30 minutes. Our industry-leading matching engine, lowest fees, no expiration, and competitive futures products empower your trading. Dominate the market with Binance Futures.
hg-module6-tab9-title: Access Token Margined trading with up to 125x leverage on Binance Futures
hg-module6-tab9-content: Maximize your potential earnings with Binance Coin-M Futures. Take positions with or without expiry, choose up to 125x leverage, and enjoy some of the lowest fees in the industry. Register today and start trading futures!

hg-module9-title: Start your crypto journey with a partner you can trust
hg-module9-subtitle1: Buy, sell, manage, and trade 150+ cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, BNB, and Ethereum. Maximize your earnings with Binance.
hg-module9-subtitle2: Our low fees and attractive VIP program beat the competition. Enjoy some of the lowest transaction fees in crypto.
hg-module9-subtitle3: Our complex security measurements and SAFU fund protect your data and assets against all risks.
hg-module9-subtitle4: Buy a fraction of Bitcoin or any other popular cryptocurrency with just $15. Use your debit or credit card. Start trading today.
hg-module13-Q1: Is my account eligible for AUD deposits / withdrawals?
hg-module13-A1:
AUD deposits / withdrawals are only enabled for Australian residents. Verify your Binance account with any of the supported documents by following this guide.

Once your account is verified in Australia, visit this page to obtain your unique PayID.

Click here for a detailed guide on how to deposit AUD, and here for the AUD withdrawal guide.
hg-module13-Q2: How do I buy Bitcoin with AUD?
hg-module13-A2: You can easily purchase Bitcoin and other crypto with your AUD balance here. For more experienced traders, you may also choose to trade here.
hg-module13-A3: AUD deposits and withdrawals are free. Kindly refer to the fee schedule for trading fees.
hg-module13-A4: All NPP-enabled Australian banks or credit unions supports NPP payments (PayID/Osko) into your unique Binance Australia PayID. Find out if your bank is NPP-enabled here.
hg-module13-Q5: What is the difference between Instant Buy and regular trading?
hg-module13-A5: Instant Buy, also known as 'One-Click Buy' is a convenient option to purchase your favourite crypto assets with your fiat or crypto balance here. Users who seek advanced trading features, may prefer to use regular trading instead, also known as an order book, such as this.
hg-module13-Q6: How long does it take for deposits to be shown in my account?
hg-module13-A6: PayID/Osko deposits are usually instant. However, depending on your bank's policies, your deposit may take 24 hours to be processed. You may check with your respective bank for more details.
hg-module13-Q7: Do you support corporates (i.e: companies, SMFSs, etc)?
hg-module13-A7: Yes, Binance supports corporate account onboarding, including SMSFs. Learn more here.
hg-module13-A8: Binance Australia is operated by InvestbyBit Pty Ltd (ABN 98_ 621 652 579) - a registered Digital Currency Exchange, regulated by the Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre (AUSTRAC)

home_faq_a1: 【加密货币】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price)交易平台是供用户买卖加密货币的数字市场，用户可以在这些平台上买卖【比特币】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/bitcoin)、【以太坊】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/ethereum)和【泰达币】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/tether)等币种。币安交易平台是全球交易量最大的加密货币交易平台。
home_faq_a6: 【币安理财】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/earn)提供多种产品，可供用户从180多种加密货币中赚取收益。我们的平台提供包括【比特币】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/bitcoin)、【以太坊】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/ethereum)和稳定币在内的数十种数字资产。
home_faq_a4: 借助【币安加密货币目录】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price)，轻松追踪最新的加密货币价格、成交量、热门竞争币和市值。点击币种，即可了解该币种的历史价格、24小时成交量以及【比特币】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/bitcoin)、【以太坊】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/ethereum)和【BNB】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/price/bnb)等币种的实时价格。
home_faq_a3: 用户可通过多种方式在币安买入加密货币。您可以使用信用卡/借记卡、现金余额或Apple Pay/Google Pay在币安上【买币】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/how-to-buy-cryptocurrency-on-binance-homepage-400c38f5e0cd4b46a1d0805c296b5582)。开始买币之前，请确保您已完成币安账户【身份认证】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/how-to-complete-identity-verification-360027287111)。
home_faq_q4: 如何追踪加密货币价格
home_faq_q1: 什么是加密货币交易平台？

home_faq_q6: 如何在币安赚取加密货币收益
home_faq_a5_b: 要想【开始交易】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/binance-beginner-s-guide-c780097f75dd450a82d17f1e84153276)，用户需要注册币安账户、完成身份认证及购买/充值加密货币，然后即可开始交易。
home_faq_a5_a: 您可以在币安【现货】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/spot-margin-trading?c=3&navId=3#15)、【杠杆】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/spot-margin-trading?c=3&navId=3#16)、【合约】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/crypto-derivatives?c=4&navId=4#18)及【期权】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/support/faq/374321c9317c473480243365298b8706)市场上交易数百种加密货币。
home_faq_a2_a:
作为全球领先的加密货币交易平台，币安目前为180多个国家/地区的1.5亿注册用户提供服务。币安手续费低廉，提供350多种可交易加密货币，是交易比特币、竞争币及其他虚拟资产的首选交易平台。 在币安，用户可以：
  • 在【现货】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/trade/BTC_USDT?theme=light&type=spot)、【杠杆】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/trade/BTC_USDT?theme=light&type=spot)和【合约】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/futures/markets/um)市场上交易数百种加密货币。
home_faq_q5: 如何在币安进行加密货币交易
home_faq_a2_b:
• 通过【币安C2C】(https://p2p.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/trade/all-payments/USDT?fiat=EUR)买卖加密货币。
  • 通过【币安理财】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/earn)赚取加密货币利息。
  • 在【币安Launchpad】(https://launchpad.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%)上购买或赚取新代币。
  • 在【币安NFT】(https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/nft/home)市场上交易与质押NFT及进行NFT借贷。

homepage-btc-halving-desc: 2024年第四次比特币减半将导致比特币挖矿奖励减少到原来的一半。这将延缓新比特币的创建速度，从而减少新比特币的总供应量。减半历来会导致价格波动，因为投资者预计减半后会出现价格反弹。

home_faq_a2:
作为全球领先的加密货币交易平台，币安目前为 180 多个国家/地区超过 2.7 亿注册用户提供服务。币安手续费低廉，提供 500 多种可交易加密货币，是交易比特币、竞争币及其他虚拟资产的首选交易平台。

在币安，用户可以：
  • 在[现货](https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/trade/BTC_USDT?theme=light&type=spot)、[杠杆](https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/trade/BTC_USDT?theme=light&type=spot)和[合约](https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/futures/markets/um)市场上交易数百种加密货币。
  • 通过[币安 C2C](https://p2p.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/trade/all-payments/USDT?fiat=EUR) 买卖加密货币。
  • 通过[币安理财](https://www.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%/earn)赚取加密货币利息。
  • 通过[币安 Launchpool](https://launchpad.%suffixOrigin%/%locale%)、空投、Megadrop 等买入或赚取新代币。
